pages.text: The Final Boss of Immersive Engineering is the ultimate power generator - Steam Turbine which will produce TONS OF ENGERGY for you. These materials are required for the Steam Turbine:        x3 Steel Scaffolding          x6 Fluid Pipe                 x1 Redstone Engineering Block  x24 Heavy Engineering Blocks  x4 Radiator Block          x27 Steel Sheetmetal         x10 Block of Steel

pages.name: Steam Turbine
pages.text: To form the structure right click on the steel block at the Redstone Engineering Block side.
You can insert Steam into this face
pages.title: Steam Input

pages.text: Now the turbine have steam now but why is not thing happend ? Because it need a Alternator as It's power output. These materials are required for the alternator:                    x4 Heavy Engineering Block  x8 Generator Blocks         x6 High-Voltage Coil Block    x5 HV capacitor              x8 Steel Sheetmetal           x2 Block Of Steel.

pages.name: Alternator
pages.text: Make sure to attach the block of steel from Alternator with the overhanged Steel Block from the Steam Turbine.

To form, you need to right click on the centre Heavy Engineering Block, when formed notice to 6 power outputs from 2 side of the Alternator L/R you can attach the Wire Connector on it and we are ready to take out the HUGE AMOUNT of powers
